Bloody Pixy:
The weak spirits of darkness can't protect the forest with their own powers and receive the help of the ‘Bloody Pixies’ (the Pixies Bloody). Fearful, unhappy, hiding under the ground, fearing the light!!
Thanks to that, we'll take care of the invaders and bandits with our own hands. If you violate the laws here... you Know because we are called ‘Bloody Pixies’. Better be careful!
